com.redhat.rhn.common.filediff

Class Diff

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.redhat.rhn.common.filediff.Diff

  • public class Diff
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the action of diffing files and displaying the result using an API of recipes. Differ is the actual file diff tool and implementers of DiffVisitor and DiffWriter are used to write results.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

    • Method Detail

      • htmlDiff

        public java.lang.String htmlDiff(boolean onlyChanged)
        Parameters:
        onlyChanged - whether the results should only changed lines.
        Returns:
        An html string for the difference between the two files.
        See Also:

      • patchDiff

        public java.lang.String patchDiff(java.lang.String pathOne,
                         java.lang.String pathTwo,
                         java.util.Date fromDate,
                         java.util.Date toDate)
        Parameters:
        pathOne - The path of the from(old, first) file
        pathTwo - The path of the to(new, second) file
        fromDate - The modified timestamp for the from (old, first) file
        toDate - The modified timestamp for the to(new, second) file
        Returns:
        A diff in unified output format. Able to be used by GNU patch.
        See Also:
        RhnPatchDiffWriter
